Articles.Content:
Kloudmutt huh? That should be interesting.

If you don't mind all the NSFW stuff, he is quite a good artist. Good use of colours and good anatomy (non-sexually).

I would be interested to see the result.
He's done a few Kerbal images and intends on more, maybe I can drag him into the community!

Hah, I can suspect all his rockets would become giant fluffy bunnies

Edit: Excuse my rather immature joke, migraine medication sort of makes me drunk for a few minutes after taking them, again excuse me.

Edit2: In case you are wondering, Sumatriptan Aurobindo 50 mg tablets, side effects include mood swings and stuff like that. I hope that the fact that I didn't delete the immature joke altogether is enough proof that I'm not trying to cover my tracks here or anything.

Edited June 3, 2013 by Rich
described in post
*facepalm* No.... in fact all the images I've seen so far have used KW Rocketry pack
*types in kloudmutt in deviantart* OH MY WHY WOULD YOU DO THAT AHHHHHHHHHHHHH CLOSE TAB CLOSE TAB CLOSE TAB WHY DID I NOT HEED YOUR WARNING!!! .
I did the same thing redwolfy, now I need some brain bleach...
Honestly i really don't like his KSP art. Sexy Kerbals? Please no! Thats just weird.
Please don't mind me, I'm just going to get something to get rid of the eye infection...

Honestly i really don't like his KSP art. Sexy Kerbals? Please no! Thats just weird.

Hmpf... I guess I'll just start drawing big baggy ugly spacesuits and overweight pilots. >.>

Hmpf... I guess I'll just start drawing big baggy ugly spacesuits and overweight pilots. >.>
There is a big difference between your Kerbals and his ones.

The spacesuits he paints are more like bathing suits, and the only one I really approve of is this one. He's a great artist, it's just that not everyone might agree with his subject matter xD With who I've hung out with these past two years, I've become VERY desensitized to "those" sorts of images, but it does have a bit of advantage. I've learned a lot from examining the way Kloudmutt shades and highlights his images, and despite them being solid colours for the most part they still feel like they have texture

ah yes bare skin against the cold temperatures of space how logical ,but i doubt every male (who is not asexual/homosexual) here is not really looking at a that (admit i know you aren't)

Edited June 3, 2013 by redwolfy
We men have other things on our mind than that, we just can't remember what it is.

Space is cold, yes, but you won't freeze to death very quickly, since there is almost nothing for you to lose heat to, and humans radiate heat rather poorly. All that exposed skin, though. <.<

Suppose the entire things aren't all that bad. There were moderately successful experiments with spacesuits that exerted pressure on the body by being skin-tight rather than through an internal atmosphere, but you'd still want trousers and sleeves. <.<
WHATY tHE HELL!? I googled Kloudmutt...KILL ME NOW DEARLORD WHAT!?

This is what we think about as men:

That massive artillery muffler could take out a army in silence.

Edited June 3, 2013 by LeonG17

Space is cold, yes, but you won't freeze to death very quickly, since there is almost nothing for you to lose heat to, and humans radiate heat rather poorly. All that exposed skin, though. <.<

Suppose the entire things aren't all that bad. There were moderately successful experiments with spacesuits that exerted pressure on the body by being skin-tight rather than through an internal atmosphere, but you'd still want trousers and sleeves. <.<

consult http://www.damninteresting.com/outer-space-exposure/ for all The things that would happen to you in space

This is what we think about as men:

That massive artillery muffler could take out a army in silence.

That's what we say we think about as men. but it's close. It's probably more along the lines of:

EDIT: wait i just say the canadian flag patch...I didn't not post this with that knowledge.
Soo, umm, guys, what have I missed in the 6 days ive been away?

Not much, and is that Ryoko Asakura?!

As for Kloudmutt's art, please consult this: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pinup. His art is designed to appeal to people with boobs and curves. Mine does the same, but with the sense that engineering and science comes first xD
Its not that we don't like Boobs (i like them very much in-fact:D) it just looks creepy on Kerbals.

This is what we think about as men:

That massive artillery muffler could take out a army in silence.

What the crap is the point of that? you can't bring it with you! A tank is a mobile weapon, that's a giant stationary penis.

True, which is why I chose a more realistic physiology!

But how can you not think the one with glasses is not cute!!!~<3 >w<

What the crap is the point of that? you can't bring it with you! A tank is a mobile weapon, that's a giant stationary penis.

THATS WHAT I THOUGHT! XD Crazy Germans..... oh wait......

What the crap is the point of that? you can't bring it with you! A tank is a mobile weapon, that's a giant stationary penis.

1. I don't think that's a tank.

2. I'm happy I wasn't the only one who saw that.
Its not a tank, its a artillery piece! Its a artillery muffler so you can destroy towns in silence!
